roleset.name: leave in a hurry
roleset.note: HIGHTAIL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hightail' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from hightail.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: gettin' outta Dodge
example.text: The scene opens with pinstripe-suited executives -- Easterners, obviously -- glued [*] to cellular phones and hightailing it out of town in chauffeur-driven limousines.
